body.p: Sometimes it is necessary to position text at a specific place in a translation. For this purpose, enables you to display a ruler in the Translation window or the window that contains the original document or another document. The ruler has the same size as the currently selected font.

To display a ruler in the Translation window, select Tailor from the Options menu or the context-sensitive popup menu and choose Ruler. To display a ruler in the window containing the original document or another document, select Tailor from the context-sensitive popup menu and choose Ruler. You get the context-sensitive popup menu by pressing the right mouse button.
